Function Documentation

bool SYS_GetBitCloudRevision ( uint8_t *  strVersion,
uint32_t *  intVersion 
)

This function reads version number in CS and returns as string.

Parameters:
[out]strVersion- string version. intVersion - integer version
Returns:
: bool. true indicates success. false indicates failure, which means version is unavailable
